name: 3drotate
author: AFNI (Analysis of Functional NeuroImages)
description: Rotates and/or translates all bricks from an AFNI dataset.

inputs.name: Dataset
inputs.description: Input AFNI dataset, may contain a sub-brick selector list
Sets the output dataset prefix name
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Prints out progress reports (to stderr)
inputs.name: Verbose

inputs.description: Shifts the dataset by specified distances (dx, dy, dz) in mm in x, y, z directions respectively, AFTER rotation
inputs.name: After Shift

inputs.description: Shifts the dataset by specified distances (dx, dy, dz) in mm in x, y, z directions respectively, BEFORE rotation
inputs.name: Before Shift

inputs.description: Specifies the 3D rotation angles (th1, th2, th3) about certain axes
inputs.name: Rotation

inputs.description: Rotation and translation should be taken from the first 3dvolreg transformation found in the header of dataset 'rset'.
inputs.name: Rotation Parent Dataset

inputs.description: Output dataset should be shifted to match the grid of dataset 'gset'. Can only be used with -rotparent.
inputs.name: Grid Parent Dataset

inputs.description: Rotation and translation should be read from DICOM file 'mfile'.
inputs.name: DICOM Matrix/Vector File

inputs.description: Rotation and translation should be read from file 'mfile' with dataset coordinate order.
inputs.name: Order Matrix/Vector File

inputs.description: Rotation and translation should be read from the .HEAD file of dataset 'mset' created by 3dTagalign.
inputs.name: Dataset Matrix/Vector

inputs.description: Reads movement parameters for each sub-brick from an ASCII file 'dname'.
inputs.name: Data File

inputs.description: Reads movement parameters for each sub-brick from a 1D ASCII file 'dname'.
inputs.name: 1D Data File

inputs.description: Specifies that (x,y,z) points are to be rotated instead of a dataset.
inputs.name: Points

inputs.description: Specifies the rotation origin point (xo, yo, zo)
inputs.name: Rotation Origin

inputs.description: Use Fourier interpolation method during transformation.
inputs.name: Fourier

inputs.description: Use nearest neighbor interpolation method during transformation.
inputs.name: Nearest Neighbor

inputs.description: Use linear interpolation (1st order polynomial) during transformation.
inputs.name: Linear Interpolation

inputs.description: Use cubic interpolation (3rd order polynomial) during transformation.
inputs.name: Cubic Interpolation

inputs.description: Use quintic interpolation (5th order Lagrange polynomial) during transformation.
inputs.name: Quintic Interpolation

inputs.description: Use heptic interpolation (7th order Lagrange polynomial) during transformation.
inputs.name: Heptic Interpolation

inputs.description: Use the Fourier method WITHOUT padding.
inputs.name: Fourier without Padding

inputs.description: Clip results to input brick range [default option].
inputs.name: Clip Results

inputs.description: Do not clip results to input brick range.
inputs.name: No Clipping

inputs.description: Zero pad around the edges by 'n' voxels during rotations.
inputs.name: Zero Padding
